## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c82f0658f0d08613ec76f5066bad323001a5a95afc35b8befc4a34c82a68e0a7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'mgz-testpkg' @ 1.0.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
